name: Knights Of Musgueria
description:
This is a small multiplayer I made for quarantine just to have something extra to play with my friends. It's kind of a simple FPS game with a sword and a grappling gun, nothing to fancy. I had to reduce some graphics due to the bad performance. It's not the most polished game ever but we had some fun playing it with my friends.

PS: The announcements in the game are in "Chilean".

Key Bindings:

ASDW: Move

Space: Jump

R: Change weapon

LBM: Shoot

RMB: Zoom

LCTRL: Slide

F: Scream

T: T Pose
